questionTitle: John and Bob have been working on this project ___ five months already.
These cherry trees have bloomed every spring ___ 1980.
He worked at that company ___ ten years before he retired.
They have been raising horses and cows on their farm ___ many years.
The fire died out ___ nine o'clock.
They've been in love ___ three weeks.
Maggie broke her leg and had to stay in the hospital ___ two days.
